item.title: Contact
item.description: Railway Gent Sint Pieters: 1,5 km. (on foot: 15 min, tram: 5 min). The tram drives every 7 minutes and stops at the other side of the road. Exit E40: 1,5 km Historical centre of Ghent: 4 km. (tram: 15 min, bike: 15 min). The tram drives every 7 minutes and halts at the other side of the road. Flanders Expo: 1,5 km UZ Gent: 2 km

item.title: Room Aimée
item.description: Room Aimée is a spacious room with King size bed (180 cm) or 2 single beds, cozy sitting area, flatscreen TV and desk. The private bathroom has a walk-in rain shower, a bath, toilet and double sink.

item.title: Room Joanna
item.description: Room Joanna is a very spacious room with King size bed (180 cm), flatscreen TV and desk. It has a spacious cozy sitting area. The private bathroom has a walk-in rain shower, toilet and sink.

item.title: Room Marie
item.description: Room Marie is a spacious room with King size bed (180 cm), cozy sitting area and desk. Due to the large windows the room enjoys plenty of natural light. The private bathroom has a walk-in rain shower, toilet and sink.
